entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as a calm and authoritative figure who has come to inform the students about Cedric's death. He mentions that he values fair play and believes in telling the truth.

entities.name: cedric diggory
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as a person who was murdered by Lord Voldemort. His death has affected everyone in the Great Hall.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as a person responsible for Cedric's murder. Dumbledore mentions that he has returned and that the Ministry of Magic does not want this information to be shared with the students.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as an organization that does not want Dumbledore to share the truth about Voldemort's return with the students.

relationships.description: Dumbledore informs the students that Cedric was murdered by Lord Voldemort.
